stripped_text: If Tempus is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Tempus, trace 3 If successful, the Runner must lose click click or suffer 1 brain damage. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Tempus from Archives.
text:
If Tempus is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Tempus, <trace>trace 3</trace> If successful, the Runner must lose [click][click] or suffer 1 brain damage. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Tempus from Archives.
title: Tempus
